name: Animal Fat
description: Animal fat is produced from the rendering down of raw meat and is used in Cooking to make late-game Foods such as Pastry , Fried Chunky Vegetables and, Freshwater Fillet Curry . It is used to create and power the Lantern .
crafted_at: Kitchen Bench Marble Kitchen Bench Butchery Bench
